data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: The weather in California is beautiful. The ____ shines ____ the ____, ____ there ____ almost ____ snow ____ rain. Sometimes ____ can ____ too ____ though! Some plants get too dry during the summer because there is no rain.
data.partBlankContent: The weather in California is beautiful. The s__ shines a__ the ti__, a__ there i_ almost ne___ snow o_ rain. Sometimes i_ can b_ too h__ though! Some plants get too dry during the summer because there is no rain.
data.answer: 加利福尼亚的天气很好。太阳一直照耀着，几乎没有雪或雨。不过有时候会特别热，有些植物在夏天变得太干燥，因为没有雨水。
